thread.title: GigaSpaces to Showcase Real-Time Analytics for Fast Data and Pure-Play Cloud Orchestration at Strata Hadoop World
thread.title_full: GigaSpaces to Showcase Real-Time Analytics for Fast Data and Pure-Play Cloud Orchestration at Strata Hadoop World - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: GigaSpaces to Showcase Real-Time Analytics for Fast Data and Pure-Play Cloud Orchestration at Strata Hadoop World
text:
Available at Booth #451: New case study reveals how XAP delivers mission critical data to a leading global airline with “no delays or cancellations”
New York, NY (PRWEB) September 28, 2015
STRATA+HADOOP WORLD // GigaSpaces Technologies, a provider of in-memory computing and cloud orchestration technologies, is showcasing its solutions for fast data, real-time processing, and cloud automation and orchestration at this year's Strata + Hadoop World conference in New York’s Javits Center.
Visit booth #451 to hear what's new with XAP In-Memory Computing and Cloudify Orchestration. To set up a meeting with the team or schedule a one-on-one live demo, follow this link .
Available at the GigaSpaces booth is a new case study—”XAP for Stream Processing and Real-Time Analytics”—featuring a global airline and its use of XAP In-Memory Computing Platform to improve their performance and scalability with real-time analytics.
The airline, which manages 16,000 flights and serves one million customers a day, had an IT infrastructure that was capable of providing refreshed data in 10-minute intervals at best. By employing XAP In-Memory Computing, the airline now has access to real-time insights of streaming data with millisecond-latency and, as a result, has immediate insights into how to optimize revenue, streamline flight network operations, and enhance passenger experience across all sales channels.
The Real-Time Analytics Case Study also is available online, and more information about GigaSpaces solutions for air transportation and travel is available here .
About GigaSpaces
GigaSpaces Technologies provides software for cloud application orchestration and scaling of mission-critical applications on cloud environments. Hundreds of Tier-1 organizations worldwide are leveraging GigaSpaces technology to enhance IT efficiency and performance, from top financial firms, e-commerce companies, online gaming providers, healthcare organizations and telecom carriers. GigaSpaces has offices in the US, Europe and Asia. More at http://www.gigaspaces.com and getcloudify.org.
